product.name: Marine BizTV
product.description: Marine BizTV creates a plethora of programs to satisfy every marine enthusiast. While few are just to entertain, others are meant to educate and evaluate the fast developing maritime world. Though, the broad spectrum of programs can be classified into twenty five categories. It does not just end with these since, there is no limit to the mighty blue sea.

product.name: Web TV
product.description:
BizTV covers various major maritime events across the globe and telecasts it through Web TV and Satellite TV providing an informative platform to the general populace.
Features include :
- Revolutionary on-line distribution with parallel streaming
- Efficient and effective interactivity
- Provides powerful profiling and relationship enhancing opportunities
- Provides full-fledged support to the satellite channel
- Ensures reach of the ideas and visions of the satellite channel to the whole world
- Live updates, informative videos and maritime industry interaction
are its core contributions and Unique video on demand facility. Marine BizTV library has more than 6000 hrs. of infotainment content. It constitutes maritime related programs, information, activities, events, conference, exhibitions, advertisements and product launches from all segments of the maritime sector.

product.name: WebTV Subscription
product.description: A unique subscription is required to access the Web TV, the on-line arm of Marine BizTV. The password contains alphanumeric characters of five(minimum) to fifteen characters (maximum) which are either automatically assigned or created depending on the type of account of the user. This enables the user to access live telecast of programs, archive and business solutions like MViD, SNS, E-STORE, Press Box and Programs Calendar.

product.name: Maritime Visual Directory
product.description: Maritime Visual Directory is the world's first and only visual maritime directory ever made. MVD includes product videos, sales presentations, advertisement, product displays, corporate videos etc and incorporates a  comprehensive list of maritime companies, searchable according to the requirement of the end user. MVD facilitates live video conferencing, where the end user can view products or presentation and converse live to the company representatives through the web directory interface.

product.name: Maritime Press Box
product.description: Maritime Press Box acts as a direct window exhibiting corporate vista of a company, along with all the latest developments. All promotional materials of a company like Press Releases, E-Brochures, E-Newsletters, Circulars, Catalogues, Presentations, etc can be uploaded.

product.name: Biz Dollar
product.description: BizDollar is an on-line business network for MARINERS, where you can maintain existing relationships and create new ones share your experiences, find new business partners etc.

product.name: Virtual Exhibition
product.description: Virtual Exhibition gives a virtual experience of participating and interacting in an exhibition. The actual exhibition will be virtually exhibited on-line, where people can log in and see the exhibition as it had taken place. It enables corporate and marine enthusiasts to see an exhibition as many times as they want, by logging on to this particular site. Exhibition taking part in any part of the world can be covered through virtual exhibition.

product.name: Video Archive
product.description: Video Archive provides a unique searchable database on the complete list of maritime programs the channel has telecast till date. It is an enriching visual library of information on the maritime world. Video archive is a very constructive study material for students aspiring in the maritime field.

product.name: Digi Ship
product.description: Digi Ship gives a complete technical profile and specifications of a sailing vessel using videography and digitalized contents. This application involving high level architecture to create a virtual representation of a ship, is a powerful tool for global vessel trade.

product.name: Interactive DVD
product.description: Events, especially seminars, conferences and technical discussions are often missed by those to whom it matters the most. A specially designed DVD from Marine BizTV with an encyclopedic interactive interface is a dream come true for those who miss crucial events. The DVD has highly interactive content which can be accessed on a computer according to your needs or convenience. Interactive DVD is an effective tool for distributing information to potential clients helping them to: Browse through entire paper presentations, It contains a searchable database and Consists transcription of talks and debates with glossary of terms.Interactive DVDs are an ideal solution to deliver flexible training that requires strong visual communication. They can be configured to be relevant to different target groups or same target group to get a tailored programme hence making the process easier, effective and convenient. Our Interactive DVD solutions give you a virtual experience and allowing you to customize your experience.

product.name: MILES Course ware
product.description: MILES Maritime Information and Live Education System is a competent and informative tool for the maritime students worldwide. With an array of wide range of informative Videos Education Materials, MILES couseware consists topics ranging from Marine Engineering to Naval Architecture, technical videos and videos of conference papers presentations.

product.name: BBTV- Roku
product.description: Broadband TV involves accessing multimedia content via broadband and viewing it on a TV. Once a customer receives the Marine BizTV box, all they need to do is plug the box to the internet router / modem. Its remote control experience is no different than watching television from your cable or satellite provider!

product.name: Client Relations Management Software
product.description: CRM offers the tools you need today to know each customer inside and out, and empower every individual in your business to deliver consistent, top-notch customer experiences.

product.name: Official TV Channel
product.description: 'Official Television Channel' is a fresh concept to help our associates widen the viewer ship visibility of their activities and events which the company wishes to share or publicize to a wider audience.

product.name: On-line Video Awards
product.description: On-line video awards are provided to honour the achievements of the experts of the maritime industry. Here, the winners are decided on the basis of their popularity among their target audience.

product.name: International Technical Advisory Panel
product.description: International Technical Advisory Panel consists of experts who provide guidance to the organization on every issue under its jurisdiction. The board comprises of members from key sectors of the marine industry from across the globe. The panel best practices in research and analysis for the maritime industry and focuses on business strategy, operations and management. The Board shares its expertise in the field while making strategic decisions.

product.name: Shoot N Share
product.description: Shoot 'n' Share aims to promote social and business networking among the entire maritime fraternity through shooting, uploading and sharing of maritime videos, either corporate or entertainment. Videos like annual corporate gatherings, local outings, in-house award ceremonies etc can be shared through this exquisite zone.

product.name: Events Calender
product.description: As variety of maritime events take place each day and the need for a precise maritime calendar becomes important, hence to cater the arising needs Events calender, an on-line encyclopedia of all maritime events was formulated. Event sponsorships, advertisements, booth booking, on-line promotion, event tie- up, visitors pass and much more are open through a single entry in the Events Calendar. The events calendar provides an exclusive list of all maritime happenings across the world, not only the forthcoming events but also the ongoing and bygone ones.

product.name: Video Dossier
product.description: Video Dossier is the video coverage of resumes of students, employees, employers and universities in the marine industry, in a more sophisticated way, offering them an increased reach ability. The new concept enables the students/ employer/ employee and universities to present themselves in an advanced way with the powerful aid of the visual media.

product.name: Ocean Blue
product.description: Ocean Blue is a marine film festival, organized by Maritime Film Society to host some of the iconic movies with marine theme.

product.name: Search Engine Optimization
product.description: To maximize the reach of our customers to their target audience and to expand their markets we give effective Search Engine Optimization (SEO) assistance and solutions. SEO not only ensures accessibility of web pages to the search engines 24x7 but also provides visibility to all products and services of the company as well.SEO done by Software solutions are http://www.ariesmar.com/, http://aimri.in/, http://pacemigration.com.au.

product.name: F Card
product.description: It is a unique card which can help you enter any festival across the world.

product.name: Maritime Cultural Olympics
product.description: Maritime Cultural Olympics is a cultural extravagance, organized by Marine BizTV, exclusively for Maritime Institutes across the world to patronize cultural harmony and give the youth of today a unique platform to showcase their talents.

product.name: All Lights Magazine
product.description: All Lights is a portal for Films and Film Festivals available both in print and on-line. The portal is developed by a group of film lovers and festival freaks. Lighting the streets of Glitz and Glamour, bringing you closer to the current actions in the world of movies, 'All Lights' provides an insight to the up coming movie ventures around the globe. Throwing light on the technical and creative facets of the 'Magical Lantern', it gives the gist of all the Film Festivals which happens in and around the planet. All Lights is an Official magazine for some of the world's renowned film festivals like European Film Market (EFM), American Film Market (AFM), Cannes International Film Festival and Hong Kong Film art. Delivering its best, All Lights publications are also available in the Academy of Motion Pictures Arts and Science (Oscar) library.

product.name: Digital CDC
product.description: Digital CDC is the software version of Continuous Discharge Certificate (CDC) or Seafarers Identification Document, a legal and officially written authenticated paper for a seafarer which contains a record of his entire sea journey.

product.name: HR Training Video
product.description: HR training videos covers company policies on discrimination, drugs and alcohol, employee benefits, supervisor training & more.

product.name: Achiever's Chronicle
product.description: Achievers Chronicle is a program designed to honour the individuals who are at the pinnacle of success courtesy their hard work and years of struggle to affirm their foot in the shipping and maritime industry. This inspirational work contains life stories, trials and tribulations of selected eminent personalities who have the potential to inspire the youth of our world.

product.name: Snake Boat Race
product.description: Boat race is one of the traditions followed here in Kerala, as part of branding this water sports Aries wishes to take this event to an international level.

product.name: on-line Job Diary
product.description: Digital version of Daily Job Diary.

product.name: Asset Management Software
product.description: A full-featured computerized maintenance management system that works best for your organization, including enterprise-wide maintenance management processes and integration of Asset Management, Inventory, Purchasing, Mobile Technology and much more.

product.name: Purchase Request Software
product.description: Purchase order tracking software provides easy to use requisitions, reviews and approvals. Download purchasing report.

product.name: Leave Software

product.name: Movie Project Management Software
product.description: Production software for independent film makers, handles budgeting, scheduling, locations, editing notes and film festival submissions.

product.name: Newsletter Software Sales
product.description: A feature rich PHP newsletter / mailing list management tool. It offers multiple lists, import, export, attachments, drafts, AJAX, notifications.

product.name: Accounts Software
product.description: Accounting software is an application software that records and processes accounting transactions within functional modules such as accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, and trial balance.

product.name: Oscar Consultancy
product.description: Our Oscar Consultancy wing offers entry level services for Oscar Selections. We deliver submission of movies to Oscar under Best Picture category. It has the same weightage of an entry through Foreign Film Category, which is gone through the countries film federation.

product.name: DAM999 Novel
product.description: DAM999 novel is a multi lingual, literary version of the movie with the same title DAM999.

product.name: HR Policy Video
product.description: The HR Policy of the company is described in this video.

product.name: International Maritime Club
product.description: International Maritime Club (IMC) is a forum for is the continuous and conscious development of the vast maritime industry.The sole aim of the club is the development of the maritime industry through the interaction of all the key players who have a role in its future.

product.name: International Maritime Institute
product.description: International Maritime Institute (IMI) is meant for encouraging collaboration between maritime institutes and introducing the students to a rich variety of Audio Visual content of academic value. International Maritime Institute interacts with IMC putting future professionals in touch with senior maritime industry members. Latest news, special advertisement slots and special edition newsletters are provided to the member institutes, with regard to announcements of conferences, events and projects, campaigns, etc. IMI also acts as an on-line organization portal for maritime institutes which has the capacity to be developed as an international approval or standard assessment authority.

product.name: Topless Ships
product.description: Topless Ships will be a new revolution in the field of ship design technology, making these giant vessels economical, faster and safer than before. This never before seen design would provide unparalleled efficiency to the current ships and increase their cost and fuel effectiveness.

product.name: Maritime Updates
product.description: Maritime Updates is a popular news portal managed by Marine BizTV which lets you stay updated with latest happenings from various maritime segments along with the most up-to-date maritime events.

product.name: Oscar Consultancy
product.description: All Lights Film Services Oscar Consultancy helps film makers 'Go GLOBAL' and embarking them towards their dream journey. The consultancy provides movies/documentaries the deserved exposure at various film festivals across the globe. All Lights Film Services' indulges in rigorous campaigns to help movies get to into the very prestigious 'Oscar Race' A highest honor awarded for excellence in cinema. All Lights Oscar consultancy, also helps film makers to contend for various other prestigious international awards like Golden Globe Awards, Screen Writers Awards, and International Music Awards so on and so forth. All Lights has given its full support to various movies out of which 4 Indian movie projects (DAM999, Saint Dracula, Hou De Jarasa Ushir and Color of Sky) made it to the Oscar qualifying race. All Lights Oscar Consultancy services would help you make your Hollywood dreams come true.

product.name: All Lights Film Magazine
product.description: All Lights is a portal for Films and Film Festivals available both in print and on-line. The portal is developed by a group of film lovers and festival freaks. Lighting the streets of Glitz and Glamour, bringing you closer to the current actions in the world of movies, 'All Lights' provides an insight to the up coming movie ventures around the globe. Throwing light on the technical and creative facets of the 'Magical Lantern', it gives the gist of all the Film Festivals which happens in and around the planet. All Lights is an Official magazine for some of the world's renowned film festivals like European Film Market (EFM), American Film Market (AFM), Cannes International Film Festival and Hong Kong Film art. Delivering its best, All Lights publications are also available in the Academy of Motion Pictures Arts and Science (Oscar) library.

product.name: Festival Consultancy
product.description: We deliver International Film Festival Submission consultancy for the movies. Under this package, we take films and submit it in the International Film Festivals outside India.

product.name: Party Surveys
product.description:
Project Management, Documentation and Audit Services Aries Marine L.L.C has built a reputation for excellence in Project Management, Documentation and Audit Services for Marine and Offshore sectors.
Managed by an experienced team comprising of Site Managers, Rig Managers, Construction Superintendents, Naval Architects, Marine Engineers, Production Engineers, E and I Engineers, HVAC and L.Q Engineers, Planning Engineers, HSE Advisor's, Document Controllers, Commissioning Engineers
- Aries Marine provides solution for Party Surveys from concept stage to its delivery.

product.name: NRIPA
product.description: NRIPA (Non Resident Indian Producers Association) is an association formed by a group of potential Non Resident Indians (NRIs) with experience and passion in film production having an operational base at Cochin, Kerala, India.

product.name: Botel
product.description: Incorporated as part of Aries consortium, the group took its infant footsteps into the tourism industry by 2005. As part of this voluntary association, the company ventured with its first project to build a state of the art 'BOTEL'. The same was later known to be 'SAFE BOTEL' (Backwater Operated Tourist Entertainment Launch) designated by its sheer resonance in the market among other house boats. The steel framed and finished 'BOTEL' later turned out to be a revolutionary design which bagged a lot of appreciation during the IIBS 2005 held in Kochi. This design was claimed to be an unsinkable one and didn't compromise on the eco friendly character to enhance its scope for tourism.

product.name: Chundan
product.description: Aries Punnamada Chundan is the 'World's Longest Steel Snake Boat' which has entered the Guinness Book of World Records, Limca Book of World Records and Asia Book of Records. This is yet another innovative creative project from Aries Marine and Engineering Services which stands apart from traditional snake boats. Aries Punnamada Chundan has a length of 144 ft and can accommodate upto141 rowers. The aim of this innovative concept is to create an international market for snake boats as it would make revolutionary changes in world's tourism sector.

product.name: DAM999 Feature Film
product.description: DAM999 is the most controversial movie of the year 2011 which was selected for Oscar race 2011 for its social appeal and strong script. The movie is still garnering positive reviews and response and is going strong at various film festival circuits.

product.name: Saint Dracula 3D
product.description: Saint Dracula 3D, the First ever 3D movie on Dracula produced by BizTV Network went on to become the most controversial movie of the year 2012.

product.name: Voyage
product.description: Official souvenir booklet containing articles on company's important verticals, technical articles from eminent leaders, and non technical articles on subjects of contemporary interest.

product.name: Navarasa- Fashion Show
product.description: ‘Navarasa’ as a brand is tailored to form exclusive merchandise to indulge those whose persona embodies the mood of the rasa

product.name: Maritime Film Society
product.description: Maritime Film Society, which is formed by a young group of cinema aficionados, hosted a festival of films with a marine theme - Ocean Blue, where some films which are considered as iconic in the history of cinema were screened. An interactive session on the marine genre of films with some of the leading cineastes and critics were the sidelines of the film festival. Maritime Film Society aims to promote movies and similar footage with a marine theme, and to enhance awareness of, and accessibility to, the art among maritime communities as well as to the general public.

product.name: Digi Booth
product.description: Digi Booths are uniformly constructed stalls, an ideal exhibition which will unlock the potential of your products to the global market.

product.name: ShipTek
product.description: Ship Tek, the flagship event of Marine  BizTV, started its voyage in 2008. After five successful years and a plethora of new initiatives, Ship Tek is regarded as one of The most anticipated events of the Maritime Industry. Ship Tek is the only international conference with worldwide live streaming. The event provides platform for resourceful business networking, exchange of knowledge, sharing ideas and expertise, unearth new innovative ideas and unleash new milestones in maritime in shipping industry.

product.name: Boat India
product.description: An International Conference on Boating and Yachting which  focuses on new trends and concepts, technology and commerce surrounding the design and construction of boats.

product.name: NDT Level 4
product.description: An International Conference on Non Destructive Testing and Industrial Quality explored the prospects advanced of NDT techniques and served as an informative platform to exchange information on latest technology and innovative ideas in the field of non destructive testing.

product.name: Submar
product.description: An International Conference on Submarine cabling and telecommunication featured the relevance and scope of fast growing fields of  submarine cabling, telecommunication, oil and offshore cabling.

product.name: Offshore Symposium
product.description: It is a one-day global meet is aimed at fostering the offshore industry through the exchange of experience and expertise.

product.name: Techno Maritime Awards
product.description: The Techno Maritime Awards are held to recognize the individuals and establishments for techno-maritime achievements.

product.name: International Maritime Awards
product.description: This well celebrated award ceremony pays tribute to the world's largest maritime community, their service partners, and some of the industry's outstanding achievements through specific award categories. Marine BizTV International maritime Awards have become a symbol of celebrations, utilising the sheer power and reach of visual media.

product.name: Legal Consultancy Cell
product.description: Legality of any business lies in the strength of a legal advisor. Considering the pros and cons of a consortium, the Aries group has ventured to form a legal cell for its in house departments and external clients. A highly qualified team of advocates with sheer knowledge and practice in different realms of legal activities shapes this department to be a very efficient and effective one.

product.name: Medi BizTV
product.description: MediBiz TV is a 24hr free to air Global Healthcare Satellite Television channel completely dedicated to bring the global medical fraternity under one roof. The medium of this channel will be in english and it would cover 150 countries initially. This channel is promoted by Biz TV Network,who are the producers of two Oscar qualified Hollywood films DAM999 and Saint Dracula 3D. Another promoter of this channel is Aries group,a consortium of 28 independent firms based in different parts of the world such as UAE, Bahrain, Qatar, K.S.A, China, U.S.A, Singapore and India.CEO of this innovative project is Mr.Sohan Roy,Hollywood director and Project Designer with 9 Oscar selections and 23 international awards for his various projects.MediBiz TV presents unique infotainment programs on healthcare sector which are targeted for the General Public as well as Medical Professionals.

product.name: BizTV Mariner's Cup
product.description: BizTV Mariners Cup is a well celebrated cricket tournament organized to provide the corporate a jovial way to recuperate weeks of hectic pressure.

product.name: Dams- The Lethal Water Bombs
product.description: Dams - The Lethal Water Bombs is a documentary which brings to screen the agony of people living in constant fear of an imminent deluge downstream an ageing dam.

product.name: World Medi Club
product.description: World Medi Club is a global platform for various social organisations spread across the globe to share their ideas on development of man kind.It is a complete non profit organisation aims at undertaking different social projects and provide consultancy services to other organisations in the similar line to achieve their goal.

product.name: ARISE
product.description: ARISE is a weekly newsletter of the Aries Group of Companies that carries news on the maritime sector from various parts of the world.It also shares , plans and highligts various inhouse projects of the company.

product.name: My Maritime
product.description: My Maritime is a new innovative desktop application from Marine BizTV that makes your search for maritime news easier than ever. The unique features of My Maritime ensure you a faster and effective search, smart indexing never lets you be at sea when you start exploring news with it. It serves as a beacon that guides you through vast oceans of information with main features like News Updates, Programmes, Archive, Events, Find Person/Company, Twitter, and Dictionary. You can search for latest news and programme videos; prepare your programme schedule; tweet with maritime updates; find the contact details of companies and important officials; get a dictionary of words related to maritime world and much more.

product.description: Marine BizTV has its own Customer Relationship Management Software exclusively for the marine community for maintaining a company's interactions with customers, clients and sales prospects. It not only uses the technology to organize, automate and synchronize business processes but also helps those involved with marketing, customer service and technical support.

Today, for every customer driven organization, it has become inevitable to build a mobile phone platform for business promotion. To cater the needs of the growing demands, our Software division builds Mobile Website (design and development).

product.name: Enterprise Resource Planning
product.description: Our dedicated team of experts provide ERP or Enterprise Resource Planning solutions to integrate internal and external management information across the entire organization. Our ERP solutions results in more efficient, streamlined and cohesive set of business units such as business finance, accounting, purchasing and distribution, material handling and inventory management, service and sales, marketing, strategic business planning and development, manufacturing operations, quality management systems, project management, training and human resource and so forth.

product.name: Legal Claims for DAM999
product.description: Legality of any business lies in the strength of a legal advisor. Considering the pros and cons of a consortium, the Aries group has ventured to form a legal cell for its in house departments and external clients. A highly qualified team of advocates with sheer knowledge and practice in different realms of legal activities shapes this department to be a very efficient and effective one. This department alone is a versatile player that deals with different industrial legality to ensure that the group functions as a responsible and rational being in the society. The Aries legal department has always played its role to ensure that the contracts the company enters into for a pin to plane is legally obliged. product.name: Destructive Testing
product.description:
ARIES Mechanical Testing Services provide a comprehensive range of Mechanical and Metallurgical analysis of the materials. We measure strength and ductility of the material under various conditions such as temperature, tension, compression, impact, load etc. Our specialized service includes on-site material composition analysis with portable 'PMI', OES (to detect carbon and vacuum elements) enabling fast analysis and quick verification on site. All elements including Carbon, P, S, B, Sn etc. can be precisely analyzed at various conditions . The chemical analysis of PIPES, PLATES, RODS, VALVES, HARDWARE, STORAGE TANKS, TURBINES, PRESSURE VESSELS, GENERATOR, HARDWARE, SPARE PARTS etc. can be done at site very easily.
Applications
- Failure analysis
- QA certification
- Verification of certificates
- Weld process/procedure qualification
- New product testing.

product.name: Destructive Testing and Chemical analysis
product.description:
- Tensile Test
- Charpy Impact Test
- Bend Test
- Vickers Hardness
- Brinell Hardness
- Rockwell Hardness test
- Fracture test
- Flattening test
- Macro Examination
- Micro Examination
- Chemical analysis (OES) (On-site and Lab)
- Inter-granular Corrosion Testing (IGCT)
- HIC Test
- Replica metallurgy (On-site and Lab)
- Ferrite Test (On-site and Lab)
- Surface roughness test (On-site and Lab)
- Paint pull off test (On-site and Lab)
- Salt contamination test (On-site and Lab).

product.name: Analysis of Fixed Offshore Platforms
product.description:
Aries Offshore Engineering is an offshoot division of Aries Marine, largest ISO 9001-2008 certified design and consultancy firm based in Sharjah. It is dedicated to cater to the needs of clients in oil and gas sector by offering specialized services and advanced analysis techniques for offshore structures. The engineering team which specializes in delivering design solutions comprises of Offshore Structural engineers, Naval Architects, Marine Engineers, Electrical Engineers and Project Managers. The Engineering team is proficient in the latest software's available in industry at various phases of design and engineering.
Our Engineering Capabilities include:
- Analysis of Fixed Offshore Platforms.

product.name: Offshore Engineering
product.description:
Offshore Engineering caters to the engineering, analysis and drawing needs of the oil and gas sector. We offer specialized services and advanced analysis techniques for offshore and onshore structures of the oil and gas industry. We specialize in delivering design solutions from specific small tasks to complete engineering packages. We utilise the most advanced and up-to-date software's prevalent in the industry in carrying out our analysis works. Our expertise covers Structural Design and Analysis, Design Calculations, Concept Designs, Conversions, Engineering and Project Management.
- Design and Analysis of:
- Analysis of Fixed and Floating offshore Platforms
- Design and analysis of Self elevating units
- Design and analysis of Topsides, Helidecks etc
